MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH48 postcode area of Bathgate. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7:20PM to safely carry out repair work on underground cable network for properties in Hill Crescent and surrounding areas and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:15 PM on Sunday, 28 March 2021
